etymology.description: Depicts an arrow piercing through the center of a target
etymology.interpretation: The character 中(中) (zhōng, "middle") visually represents an arrow passing through the central point of a target, illustrating the concept of 'center' or 'middle' effectively. This visual imagery is straightforward and memorable, corresponding closely with its meaning of being at the center or middle of something.

examples.chinese: 他站在道路中(他站在道路中)，看着远方(看著遠方)。
examples.pinyin: tā zhàn zài dàolù zhōng, kànzhe yuǎnfāng.
examples.english: He stands in the middle of the road, gazing into the distance.

examples.chinese: 房间正中(房間正中)，挂着一幅名画(掛著一幅名畫)。
examples.pinyin: fángjiān zhèng zhōng, guàzhe yī fú mínghuà.
examples.english: A famous painting hangs in the exact center of the room.
